A woman who hates cats (Alice Krige) and her son (Brian Krause) have moved into a small town, and must deal with a mean cat hatin’ sheriff (and his k-9). The youth is having trouble fitting in ; he either sports the latest gang fashion (a jacket), or wears one of four tuxes he has inherited from Kathie’s epileptic late husband. Mom runs an antique store; she tries to sell teddy bears
